DOC.HEADLINE: EDITOR ' S NOTE
DOC.TEXT: Although " Doonesbury " creator Garry Trudeau refers to the Catholic_church as blessing same-sex unions , most , but not all , of the claims of such unions point to rituals and practices of Catholics who later came_to be identified with the Eastern Orthodox Church . Church spokesmen dispute the claims Also , Roman_Catholic teaching holds that homosexual orientation is not in itself sinful , but sexual_activity outside a heterosexual marriage is considered a sin .
